page.title: 03Sport/leisure-Llanhari area
page.content: In the area surveyed by our school there are many facilities for sport and leisure. In Brynsadler there is a sportsground in the grounds of Talygarn hospital and another in Oak Park. In Llanhari there are playing fields, tennis courts and netball pitches adjacent to Ysgol Gyfun Llanhari. The village primary school has one football pitch,a netball pitch and a playground. All these facilities are owned by Mid Glamorgan county council. In the Talbot Green area there are four fields consisting of one school field, a rugby field and two childrens playgrounds. The area surveyed also includes part of Llantrisant golf club. For further information on sport and leisure in Pontyclun see page 16.
